name: Yoshi's Safari
overview: Bowser, King of the Koopas, and his evil offspring have invaded yet another kingdom. The Koopalings have seized the Kingdom's precious crystals. It's up to you, armed with your trusty Super Scope, to ride Yoshi to the rescue! Play alone or have a friend join you to guide Yoshi. The unique first-person viewpoint is provided exclusively by the Super NES and its Mode 7 graphics capability. Combined with the pinpoint accuracy of the Super Scope, Yoshi's Safari is sure fire fun!
